name: Space Block Survival
description:
Space Block Survival is a simplistic space survival game. Destroy enemies and planets to gain resource, and use that resource to build or improve.

Arrow keys to move.
Z key to shoot.

Q to turn on magnet. (30 resource)

W to repair. (80 resource)

E to enable building. (A for aim) (20 resource a block)

T to teleport.

X to exit building.
